TutoExplainContent: Welcome to the famous memorize game: find matching pairs in pre-existing game (addition, letters, sounds) or create easily new games by yourself
TutoNumberOne: Choose one of the number 1 cards...
TutoNumberTwo: ...then choose one of the number 2 card to begin matching
TutoExplainPlay: Try to remember where all the cards are and match them
TutoActivity: Click here to update the title of the activity to easily find it in the Journal
TutoNetwork: This menu let you share your activity with other users
TutoGameTemplate: Click here to choose the types of cards you want to match (addition, letters, sounds)
TutoGameSize: Click here to change the grid size of your board
TutoResetGame: Click here to reset the game
TutoOpenEditor: Click here to create your new game or update the current one
TutoInsertMode: Click here to define if the user will search two times the same card or if he will search two different cards representing the same concept
TutoPlayMode: Click here to define if cards are splitted in two groups or if cards are mixed together
TutoClear: Click here to clear all cards
TutoEditorInputBox: Type here the text for your card
TutorEditorInsertImage: Click here to use an image for your card instead of a text
TutoEditorAddButton: Click here to create a new pair
TutoEditorUpdateButton: Click here to update the pair
TutoEditorDeleteButton: Click here to clear the current pair
TutoSounds2: ...then choose one other card to begin matching
TutoEditorPlayMode: Click here to go back to play mode
